api_info.name: TCGplayer API
api_info.description: Comprehensive API for trading card game marketplace operations

app.name: Authorize an Application
app.description: Create an application key based on a previously generated authorization code.

catalog.name: List All Categories
catalog.description: This endpoint returns a paged list of all categories supported by TCGplayer. This endpoint is a good starting point for getting information about all of the different product categories that are listed on TCGplayer.

query_parameters.name: offset
query_parameters.description: Used for paging. The number of categories to skip. Default is 0.

query_parameters.name: limit
query_parameters.description: Used for paging. The maximum number of categories to return. Default is 10.

query_parameters.name: sortOrder
query_parameters.description: The name of the property by which to sort the returned categories. If not specified, results will be sorted by name.

query_parameters.name: sortDesc
query_parameters.description: If true then sort descending, otherwise sort ascending.

responses.400: Offset is less than 0 or limit is less than or equal to 0.

catalog.name: Get Category Details
catalog.description: This endpoint returns an array of categories whose Ids were specified in the categoryIds parameter. Categories that could be found are returned in the results array in the response. Categories that could not be found are indicated in the errors array. This endpoint will return more information about a specific category or set of categories.

path_parameters.name: categoryIds
path_parameters.description: A comma delimited list of Ids if the categories to be returned.

responses.207: Some categories found. Those that were found are returned. Those that were not are indicated by an error message.

catalog.name: Get Category Search Manifest
catalog.description: Returns a search manifest for the specified category that describes all of the sorting options and filters available

path_parameters.name: categoryId
path_parameters.description: The ID of the category to get search manifest for.

catalog.name: Search Category Products
catalog.description: Search for products within a specific category using filters and sorting

path_parameters.name: categoryId
path_parameters.description: The ID of the category to search within.

catalog.name: List All Category Groups
catalog.description: Returns paginated list of groups/sets for a specific category

path_parameters.name: categoryId
path_parameters.description: Specifies the category to retrieve groups for

catalog.name: List All Category Rarities
catalog.description: Returns array of rarity objects for specified category

path_parameters.name: categoryId
path_parameters.description: Specifies the category to retrieve rarities for

catalog.name: List All Category Printings
catalog.description: Returns all different printing options for a specific product line

catalog.name: List All Category Conditions
catalog.description: Returns available conditions for a specific category

path_parameters.name: categoryId
path_parameters.description: The specific category ID to retrieve conditions for

catalog.name: List All Category Languages
catalog.description: Returns list of available languages for specified category

path_parameters.name: categoryId
path_parameters.description: The specific category ID to retrieve languages for

catalog.name: List All Category Media
catalog.description: Returns all available media (e.g. images) associated with the specified category

catalog.name: List All Groups Details
catalog.description: Returns paginated list of product groups/sets with detailed information

catalog.name: Get Group Details
catalog.description: Returns array of group details matching requested group IDs

path_parameters.name: groupIds
path_parameters.description: Comma-separated list of group IDs to retrieve details for

catalog.name: List All Group Media
catalog.description: Returns all available media (e.g. images) associated with the specified group

catalog.name: Get Product Details
catalog.description: Returns array of product details for specified product IDs

path_parameters.name: productIds
path_parameters.description: A list of product IDs to retrieve details for

catalog.name: Get Product Details By GTIN
catalog.description: Retrieves product details using GTIN-13 product codes

catalog.name: List Product SKUs
catalog.description: Returns array of SKU details for the specified product

path_parameters.name: productId
path_parameters.description: The unique identifier of the product

catalog.name: List Related Products
catalog.description: Returns other products that are commonly found in the same orders as the specified anchor product

path_parameters.name: productId
path_parameters.description: The ID of the product to find related products for

catalog.name: List All Product Media Types
catalog.description: Returns media (primarily images) for a specific product

catalog.name: List Conditions
catalog.description: Returns an array contain all of the normalized conditions supported by TCGplayer

catalog.name: Get SKU details
catalog.description: Returns array of SKU details matching requested IDs

path_parameters.name: skuIds
path_parameters.description: Comma-separated list of SKU IDs to retrieve

catalog.name: List All Products
catalog.description: Returns detailed product information based on search criteria

pricing.name: Get Market Price by SKU
pricing.description: Gets the current Market Price for the specified SKU. Does not support comma-separated lists of SKUs.

path_parameters.name: productconditionId
path_parameters.description: The product condition ID (SKU) to get market price for.

pricing.name: List Product Market Prices
pricing.description: Returns all product market prices for the Ids specified. Accepts comma-separated list of product ids.

path_parameters.name: productIds
path_parameters.description: Comma-separated list of product IDs to get pricing for.

pricing.name: List SKU Market Prices
pricing.description: Returns all SKU market prices for the Ids specified. Accepts comma-separated list of product SKUs/productConditionIds.

path_parameters.name: skuIds
path_parameters.description: Comma-separated list of SKU/productConditionId values to get pricing for.

pricing.name: List Product Prices by Group
pricing.description: Returns all product prices associated with the specified Group

path_parameters.name: groupId
path_parameters.description: The ID of the product group/set to get pricing for.

pricing.name: List Product Buylist Prices
pricing.description: Returns all product buylist prices for the Ids specified. Buylist prices that could be found are returned in the results array

pricing.name: List SKU Buylist Prices
pricing.description: Returns buylist prices for specified SKUs

path_parameters.name: skuIds
path_parameters.description: Comma-separated list of SKU IDs to retrieve buylist prices for

pricing.name: List Product Buylist Prices by Group
pricing.description: Returns all product buylist prices associated with the specified Group

inventory.name: Get ProductList By Id
inventory.description: Returns detailed information about a specific product list by ID

path_parameters.name: productListId
path_parameters.description: Integer ID of the product list to retrieve

inventory.name: Get ProductList By Key
inventory.description: Returns detailed information about a specific product list by key

path_parameters.name: productListKey
path_parameters.description: A unique identifier for the product list

inventory.name: List All ProductLists
inventory.description: Lists all the accessible ProductLists to the user identified in the bearer token

inventory.name: Create ProductList
inventory.description: Create a new list of products similar to how the Quicklist application creates a new list
inventory.authentication: Requires specific permissions - not accessible by all users

stores.name: Search Stores
stores.description: Returns a collection of storeKey values based on the search parameters

stores.name: Get Product Inventory Quantities
stores.description: Gets inventory quantities for a specific product at a store

path_parameters.name: productId
path_parameters.description: Specific product identifier to retrieve inventory for

stores.name: List Product Summary
stores.description: Returns all products currently for sale in a specific store

stores.name: Get SKU Quantity
stores.description: Returns quantity of a specific SKU in store inventory

stores.name: Update SKU inventory
stores.description: Adds or updates a SKU in the store's inventory

stores.name: Update SKU Inventory Price
stores.description: Updates pricing for a single SKU in the authenticated store

stores.name: Get Store Info
stores.description: Return general information about the current Store associated with the current bearer token

stores.name: Get Customer Summary
stores.description: Returns the total number of orders and total product dollar amount for all orders a customer has place with the seller

stores.name: Search Store Customers
stores.description: Search Store Customers

stores.name: Get Customer Addresses
stores.description: Returns the shipping addresses associated with the orders a customer has placed with the seller

stores.name: Get Customer Orders
stores.description: Returns a list of orders containing the total product quantity and total product dollar amount for each order a customer has placed with the seller

stores.name: Get Store Address
stores.description: Return address information about the Store specified by the storeKey
stores.authentication: Bearer Token required - Only works on the currently authenticated store

stores.name: Get Free Shipping Option
stores.description: Returns free shipping settings for the store
stores.authentication: Bearer Token required - Only works with the currently authenticated store

stores.name: List Shipping Options
stores.description: Returns a list of available shipping options for a specific product

stores.name: Get Store Feedback
stores.description: Returns feedback metrics for the store across different time periods
stores.authentication: Bearer Token required - Only works on the currently authenticated store

stores.name: Set Store Status
stores.description: Toggle store visibility in marketplace between Live and Hold status

path_parameters.name: status
path_parameters.description: Target store status (Live or Hold - User Request)

stores.name: Batch Update Store Buylist Prices
stores.description: Perform multiple buylist updates asynchronously in a batch

stores.name: Create SKU Buylist
stores.description: Creates a new Buylist price for a SKU that doesn't have an existing Buylist price

stores.name: Update SKU Buylist Price
stores.description: Updates a Buylist pricing that has already been set in the system

stores.name: Update SKU Buylist Quantity
stores.description: Updates a Buylist quantity that has already been set in the system

stores.name: Get Buylist Categories
stores.description: Returns list of buylist categories for the specified store

stores.name: Get Buylist Groups
stores.description: Returns list of buylist groups for the specified store

stores.name: Get Store Buylist Settings
stores.description: Returns buylist settings for the specified store

stores.name: Increment SKU Inventory Quantity
stores.description: Increments the current store's inventory of this SKU

path_parameters.name: skuId
path_parameters.description: Identifies the specific SKU to update inventory for

stores.name: Batch Update Store Sku Prices
stores.description: Performs multiple price updates simultaneously with asynchronous processing

stores.name: List SKU List Price
stores.description: Retrieves current store inventory pricing with pagination support

stores.name: Get SKU List Price
stores.description: Gets the current list price for a specific SKU in the store

stores.name: Get Store Info
stores.description: Return general information about the stores specified by the store keys

path_parameters.name: storeKeys
path_parameters.description: Multiple store keys can be specified

stores.name: Search Orders
stores.description: Search Orders. Returns an array containing the order numbers that match a specific search criteria

stores.name: Get Order Tracking Numbers
stores.description: Get Order Tracking Numbers

stores.name: Add Order Tracking Number
stores.description: Add tracking information to an open order

path_parameters.name: orderNumber
path_parameters.description: Specific order to add tracking to

stores.name: Get Order Manifest
stores.description: Returns comprehensive order-related type definitions

stores.name: Get Order Details
stores.description: Returns detailed order information including customer details and financial breakdown

path_parameters.name: orderNumbers
path_parameters.description: One or multiple order numbers to retrieve

stores.name: Get Order Items
stores.description: Returns detailed order line items including SKU, price, quantity

stores.name: Get Order Feedback
stores.description: Get Order Feedback

stores.name: List All Groups
stores.description: Returns groups currently for sale by the authenticated store

stores.name: List Product SKUs
stores.description: Return all of the SKUs the store currently has listed for a specific product.

stores.name: List Related Products
stores.description: Related Products are other Products that are often purchased along with the specified Product.

stores.name: List All Categories
stores.description: List All Categories.

stores.name: List Store Channels
stores.description: List All Channels for a Store

stores.name: Get a Store's Buylist Products for Kiosk use
stores.description: Get a Store's Buylist Products for Kiosk use

stores.name: Get the Product Conditions for a Product on a Store's Buylist
stores.description: Get the Product Conditions for a Product on a Store's Buylist

stores.name: List Product Summary By Category
stores.description: List all products based on criteria

request_body.description: Search criteria for products within the category

stores.name: List Top Sold Products
stores.description: This endpoint returns the product category that received the most sales by the currently authenticated store.

stores.name: Search Top Sold Products
stores.description: Listing comes from the current Store's inventory whose Seller is associated with the user's bearer token

stores.name: List Catalog Objects
stores.description: Search current catalog products by a variety of search fields

stores.name: Search Custom Listings
stores.description: Retrieves the custom listing by the criteria passed in the querystring.

notes.data_collection_method: Systematically scraped from TCGplayer API documentation using WebFetch tool
notes.coverage_improvement: Improved from 64% (51/80) to 100% (80/80) detailed specifications - COMPLETE!
notes.priority_1_critical_endpoints: COMPLETED: 13/13 critical endpoints (6 catalog/pricing + 7 store endpoints)
notes.priority_2_catalog_endpoints: COMPLETED: 19/19 catalog endpoints - all Priority 2 catalog endpoints extracted
notes.priority_3_pricing_endpoints: COMPLETED: 3/3 buylist pricing endpoints - all Priority 3 pricing endpoints extracted
notes.priority_4_inventory_endpoints: COMPLETED: 4/4 inventory endpoints - all Priority 4 inventory endpoints extracted
notes.priority_5_stores_complete: COMPLETED: ALL 47/47 stores endpoints extracted - Full store management API coverage
notes.authentication_required: Most endpoints require TCGplayer API credentials (Client ID and Client Secret)
notes.rate_limiting: API implements rate limiting - typically 10 requests per second
notes.response_format: All endpoints return JSON responses with consistent error handling structure
